metadata.title: CVE-2021-43082 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in the stats-over-http plugin of Apache Traffic Server allows an attacker to overwrite memory. This issue affects Apache Traffic Server 9.1.0.

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
